title: irukandji
author: irukandji
content: This week some very early bitcoin moved.https://bitcoinmagazine.com/business/satoshi-era-wallets-moved-16-million-worth-of-bitcoinDid these bitcoin follow the Patoshi pattern?https://blog.lopp.net/was-satoshi-a-greedy-miner/

comments.author: irukandji
comments.body: I just saw there is another thread on this. Would a mod please merge this into that thread?

comments.author: FinneysTrueVision
comments.body: Jameson Lopp already stated that they don’t fall into this pattern.https://twitter.com/lopp/status/1837139429153968543If potentially Satoshi had moved some coins it would have been a much bigger story and we would have seen some huge price swings. It would be interesting to know the backstory behind this miner who held those coins since the earliest days, but I don’t expect them to ever come forward.

comments.author: SickDayIn
comments.body: Quote from: FinneysTrueVision on September 22, 2024, 03:39:18 AMJameson Lopp already stated that they don’t fall into this pattern.https://twitter.com/lopp/status/1837139429153968543If potentially Satoshi had moved some coins it would have been a much bigger story and we would have seen some huge price swings. It would be interesting to know the backstory behind this miner who held those coins since the earliest days, but I don’t expect them to ever come forward.Agreed. When people are moving coins that haven't moved in forever, they're most likely old miners that have recovered their coins. Any mention of it being Satoshi is just to drum up attention for the media.

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Quote from: irukandji on September 22, 2024, 03:32:05 AMI just saw there is another thread on this. Would a mod please merge this into that thread?They won’t do that, it’s not something they do. I would suggest locking it (far bottom left)
